column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=At the end of a long hard day I like to take a nice bath to relax and refresh .
#text=On Monday evening , I came home from work and then got ready for my bath .
#text=I started running the water in the tub while I gathered a few items .
#text=First I placed candles around the edge of the tub and lit them for ambience .
#text=Then I put in some bath salts to make the water scented and smooth .
#text=I put some towels near the edge of the tub so they would be ready when I got out .
#text=Then I slid into the water and enjoyed the relaxing warmth for twenty or thirty minutes .
#text=When it was time to get out , I started letting the water out of the tub and ran a little more warm water to rinse off with .
#text=Once I was finished , I exited the tub and bundled up in the warm towels .
